sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button, Modal, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './Product.css'; // Import Product component CSS function Product() { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); // State for managing products const [formData, setFormData] = useState({}); // State for form data const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); // State for managing modal // Function to handle form submission const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Add new product to products array setProducts([...products, formData]); // Clear form data setFormData({}); // Close modal setShowModal(false); }; return (

Products Management

{products.map((product, index) => (

{product.name}

Category: {product.category}

Price: ${product.price}

Stock: {product.stock} units

 ))} setShowModal(false)}> Add New Product
Product Name setFormData({ ...formData, name: e.target.value })} /> Category setFormData({ ...formData, category: e.target.value })} /> Price setFormData({ ...formData, price: e.target.value })} /> Stock Quantity setFormData({ ...formData, stock: e.target.value })} />
); } export default Product;
